content: [/img]2023 Bitcoin Penny® Silver Dollars — DIY / fundable crypto goodness!Introducing the new DIY / fundable Silver Dollars from The Bitcoin Penny Company!Yes! We finally made these silver beauties! On the project books since Summer 2016 and a constant request by our forum friends, now they’re here in all their loadable loveliness!Bitcoin Penny® Silver Dollars are minted from 1oz fine silver (.999) and come with multiple authentic BP® holographic security stickers. Protect your precious bits in style, and pass some on to friends & family as shiny glamour gifts! PM to inquire.SHIPPINGUSA shipping is an additional charge of $10 USD. International (non-USA) shipping is an additional charge of $25 USD. (These rates are subject to change.) Please allow 3 weeks for shipping. Note that we are unable to claim false values on international orders for the purpose of avoiding VAT, duties, and customs charges. Official invoice prices will be based on the full USD values as advertised above.RETURNS & REFUNDSOur customers are welcome to return any of our fine products within 10 business days due to manufacturing defects only. All refunds will be issued to the customer as either store credit to be redeemed for future purchases or as a cash refund issued in the same amount and form of currency as originally paid by the customer. The Bitcoin Penny Company abides by the decade-old mantra of bitcoin enthusiasts around the world: “BITCOIN IS BITCOIN. FIAT IS FIAT.”DOODLESYes, you'll receive one free Bitcoin Penny® doodle with your purchase!ETC.For more information, simply PM.Regards,Chris @ The Bitcoin Penny Co.In Code We Trust® / E-Currency Unum®DISCLAIMER: Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins are for entertainment purposes only.
